_explanation.purpose: Domain phase - adds domain concepts (entities, workflows, rules) to existing story graph outline
_explanation.scope: ONLY adds/updates domain_concepts arrays. NEVER modifies story structure (epics, sub_epics, stories)
_explanation.domain_placement: Place domain_concepts at most specific level ('local' scope). Elevate to parent only if concept is shared by multiple children ('global' scope)
_explanation.structure: Each domain concept has: name, module (source folder path), inherits_from (optional base class), responsibilities (with names and collaborators), and attributes (with names and types)
_explanation.module_field: REQUIRED - Every concept MUST have module field matching source folder structure (see use_module_for_folder_structure rule for details)
_explanation.inherits_from_field: OPTIONAL - When a class inherits from a base class, include inherits_from field with base class name
